name: Pirate Sails: Tempest War
description:
Welcome to Pirate Sails! An exciting pirate simulator game!
Get ready to become a great pirate, pillage the seven seas, and conquer new lands!

The only Pirate Strategy Game you will ever need!
Pirate Sails combines an epic pirate experience, where strategy meets fantasy. Sail through exciting tempest winds in search for treasure, build your kingdom, strengthen your alliance, and rise to battle!
Only the strong and tactical will survive! Head to the battlefront, pirates! Your next conquest awaits!

MAIN FEATURES:
● Battle THOUSANDS of other players!
● Build and develop your pirate island to be indestructible!
● Uncover an epic PVE Story like no other!
● Create alliances to catapult your career growth & climb the ranks!
● Battle in Global Events for Bonuses!
● Opportunity to craft your own equipment to fend off monsters!
● Unbelievable Pirate atmosphere and stunning graphics!
● Free Daily Rewards, because every pirate needs loot!
● Ability to play with your friends, anytime, anywhere!

Pirate Sails is a FREE RPG Pirate Strategy game. That being said, some items can be purchased for real money. Not to worry, whichever option you choose, the game always remains fun and exciting!
